thread.title: The NFL Could Officially Not Get Any Lamer​
thread.title_full: The NFL Could Officially Not Get Any Lamer​

author: jnosek1
title: The NFL Could Officially Not Get Any Lamer​
text:
— Troy Vincent (@TroyVincent23) March 21, 2017 
We’re not going to say what the NFL should be doing instead with its time and resources because the league has plenty of those to go around. However, killing this fun-sucking idea likely won't help with one of the biggest issues the NFL is facing: diminishing ratings. Last year the NFL saw its ratings drop 8 percent from the previous season. Will cracking down on one of the most fun elements of the game bring the fans back? Probably not. 
Fortunately, there won’t be any new rules this season, per Vincent . He’s just seeking clarity for precisely how boring the league should be. So much for those rumors about more relaxed rules, though.
